text:
Message 996 of 4024
Ok... you are AWESOME. Can you do that in cash? I assume they will like that better. $200?
If easier, we can just swap in front of our house. I don’t want it stuck in your car. It’s way too heavy for you to move. I’ll help all I can, and assure you
will feel safe.
Please don’t worry about remotes. I got you Universal Samsungs. So yours will work on either, so will mine. So let’s just swap TVs.
Speaking of remotes, I had shared a picture of the light switch remote that did not come over with the actual switcher. I’d love that if you were able to
find.
Sent:02/03/2024 at 06:50 AM
From:Robert Moyer

Subject:Re: Lugg Tip
Message 997 of 4024
This is OFW... so still RO compliant.
I assume Anna Lisa has not gotten back to you. It’s limited to 45 minutes a month. It’s a baby step but still incremental towards normalcy. It would
also ease some of my anxiety. Want to try it out to see if it helps us?
And not today of course... lol

His arm will be hurting this morning. We are past the point where ice makes a difference, but we should get some children’s Tylenol in him as quickly
as possible.
Thank you
